name: contactmanager
description: A [Giraffe](https://github.com/giraffe-fsharp/Giraffe) web application, which has been created via the `dotnet new giraffe` command.

scripts.start: dotnet restore src/BackEnd && dotnet build src/BackEnd && dotnet run --project src/BackEnd
scripts.build: elm make src/FrontEnd/Main.elm --output src/BackEnd/WebRoot/elm.js --debug && uglifyjs src/BackEnd/WebRoot/elm.js -o src/BackEnd/WebRoot/elm.min.js && rimraf src/BackEnd/WebRoot/elm.js
